answers.answer: Tell them to call Quest and "add" the cbc but not the other redundant stuff -- the lab will usually have enough blood left over.  That will save you from getting stuck again. And while you're adding, they mine as well add the "A1c" test which will give you the average of your blood glucose for the last 2-3 months. If it me, I'd save my money at this point and not order another Heptimax till at least week 4.Be well,-- Jim

You might also gently explain to your nurse at some point that "Heptimax" replaces and is therefore redundant to the quantitative and qualitative tests they have been ordering -- but to go ahead and order them anyway if THEY want to pick up the bill :)-- Jim
